summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment Roll of Local Improvement District No. 6712 for the improvement of portion of the East-West Alley between W. Elmore St. and W. Jameson St. from 27th Ave. W. to the North-South alley in said block; under Ordinance 108252, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
